text:
="preserve">Robert Reed "Bob" Shahan (October 18, 1939 – August 14, 2020) was an American Anglican prelate. He was the bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of Arizona from 1992 to 2004. He was born in Elkhart, Kansas. He was made bishop by Edmond L. Browning.
Shahan died on August 14, 2020 at the age of 80.
